name: The Interdimensionnal Quest
description:
Game created during the UPSI JAM 1.0, by Allan, Maëlys & Thibault.

The theme was Upside Down.

The Interdimensionnal Quest is a one player, puzzle-platform, speedrun game. The player tries to reach the end as fast as possible, while potentially also collecting all the coins.

For doing so, you will have a super power : you can teleport yourself in a parallel dimension, allowing you to move across a whole multiverse. Master your skills, and you will be able to reach your destination and beat your score !

Controls:

A : Left
D : Right
Space : Climb ladder
Left Shift : Go down on ladder
Space : Jump
E : Teleport to the same place in the other dimension

Tip :

Some times, you will need to time your teleportations... When falling, the torches might help you a bit. Or they may not. I'm not sure.

If you really are stuck, you can download the solution video under the Download section. You will however need to find the path for all the coins by yourself :)

Current best score : 3045  - (Please tell us if you can do better ;) ) (Discord: .jpeg#7169, Λ2#6699, Lord_Tigrou#2391)
